stories.story: As a User, I want to login with @special#characters$ so that I can access my account.

detected_violations.issue: The user story contains invalid characters: "$, #, @"
detected_violations.suggestion: Remove invalid characters from the user story

stories.story: As a User, I want to save my work so that I don't lose progress. (Note: This should auto-save every 5 minutes)

detected_violations.issue: The user story contains invalid characters: "(, :, )"
detected_violations.suggestion: Remove invalid characters from the user story

detected_violations.issue: The user story contains unnecessary info: ")"
detected_violations.suggestion: Remove unnecessary info from the user story.

stories.story: As a Customer, I want to search for products so that I can find what I need.

component.ends: I can find what I need

stories.story: As a Writer, I want to format text with bold & italic styles so that I can emphasize content.

component.means: format text with bold & italic styles

detected_violations.issue: The user story contains invalid characters: "&"
detected_violations.suggestion: Remove invalid characters from the user story

stories.story: As a Manager, I want to export reports so that I can share them offline.
